actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that the General Services Administration provide information concerning public buildings in a certain form for the Committee on Environment and Public Works of the Senate and the Committee on Public Works and Transportation of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Requires the General Services Administration to include information on the commercial equivalent rates for the estimated cost of leased space whenever it submits information to specified congressional committees relating to leasing rates for public buildings.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the General Services Administration provide information concerning public buildings in a certain form for the Committee on Environment and Public Works of the Senate and the Committee on Public Works and Transportation of the House of Representatives.
